title: Tourist Survival Hebrew
description: Essential phrases and cultural guide for visiting Israel - perfect for travelers and tourists

courses.title: Tourist Survival Guide
courses.description: Essential Hebrew for visiting Israel - emergency phrases, navigation, cultural customs, and travel tips

lessons.title: Emergency: Getting Help
objectives: Know how to ask for help

lessons.title: Understanding Shabbat
lessons.theme: Cultural guide: Friday night to Saturday night
objectives: Learn proper etiquette in religious areas
grammarNotes: Shabbat starts Friday sunset, ends Saturday night
Most shops, buses, trains stop in Jewish areas
Plan ahead: buy food, charge phones Friday
Some areas completely shut down, others stay open
Tel Aviv more secular, Jerusalem more religious
Respect: dress modestly in religious neighborhoods

lessons.title: Cultural Customs Guide
grammarNotes: Israelis are direct - not rude, just honest
Dress code: modest at religious sites
Photography: ask permission at religious sites
Handshakes common, but ask in religious areas

lessons.title: Staying Safe in Israel
grammarNotes: Israel is generally very safe for tourists
Security presence is high - this is normal
Unattended bags trigger evacuations - watch yours
Follow local news and embassy alerts
Download Red Alert app for emergency notifications

lessons.title: Exploring Israel: Regions
grammarNotes: Tel Aviv: beaches, nightlife, secular culture

lessons.title: Weather & What to Pack
grammarNotes: Swimsuit for Dead Sea and beaches

lessons.title: Understanding Kosher
grammarNotes: Pork and shellfish not in kosher places

lessons.title: Shopping at the Shuk
grammarNotes: Best markets: Mahane Yehuda (Jerusalem), Carmel (Tel Aviv)

lessons.title: Staying Connected
grammarNotes: Buy local SIM at airport or city
Free WiFi common in cafes, hotels

lessons.title: Visiting Religious Sites
grammarNotes: Women: bring scarf for head covering
Men: may need to cover head (kippah provided)
No photography on Shabbat at Jewish sites
Western Wall: men and women separate sections
Check opening hours - vary by site and day

lessons.title: Final Travel Tips
grammarNotes: Learn a few Hebrew words - locals appreciate it
English widely spoken in tourist areas
